jmf 0.1.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

JMF R utility functions

Installation

You can install the current version of jmf from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jmf-vienna/jmf-r")

Usage 

library(jmf)
